Class BaseWebServiceTransactionFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.http.BaseFilter
      • nl.strohalm.cyclos.http.OncePerRequestFilter

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RestFilter, WebServicesTransactionFilter

    public abstract class BaseWebServiceTransactionFilter
extends OncePerRequestFilter
    Base filter for web services transaction management
    Author:
    luis
